item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Exception
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Exception Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Exception data type represents a SoftLayer_Exception. Local exceptionClass The SoftLayer_Exception class that the error is. Type: string exceptionMessage The exception message. Type: string
